channel.title: +1 Forward - Shibuyan Knights
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/shibuyan-knights
Rach and Rich bring on Moe Poplar of Ashy Feet Games to talk about his shonen anime-styled Steampunk RPG *Shibuyan Knights.*
Timecodes: 0:01:26 - Read a Sitch about character keepers 0:11:42 - Open Your Brain to *Shibuyan Knights* 0:17:53 - Act Under Fire with Ramen and Yuzu!
